source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.
source_objects.title: 3D & Animation

items.title: How to Animate Logos for Companies & Brands
items.headline: Practical Animation that Brings Logos to Life In 1 Hour or Less
objectives_summary: Animate Logos using simple Motion Recipes

items.title: Full project using Revit Structure - Basic Modeling
items.headline: your first step to learn Revit Structure
objectives_summary: Make a full 3D BIM structural model
Add reinforcement to different structural elements

items.title: Create Your Own Character in Blender
items.headline: Learn the Great skill of character creation with Blender 3D
objectives_summary: Add reference images
Use mirroring to speed up the modelling process
Model an entire character

items.title: MECHANISMS AND MOTION - ROBOTICS FOCUS
items.headline: PREPARING FOR A CAREER IN MECHANICAL ENGINEERING & 3D DESIGN - Solid Edge; Solidworks; Creo; Blender; AutoCad
objectives_summary: Gain a better mechanical understanding of how mechanisms work and relate to machine and robot design.  Prepare yourself for the first class you will take in Mechanical Engineering at University.

items.title: Learn Maya - Character Head Modeling for Beginners
items.headline: This course will open your path towards character modeling.
objectives_summary: Create good facial topology
Eyes modeling
Nose modeling

items.title: Improve Anime Drawings With Leonardo DaVinci Method
items.headline: Learn how to apply the Method by Leonardo DaVinci to improve your drawings.
objectives_summary: Draw amazing pictures by memory
Improve any past drawings made from a reference

items.title: Create 3D Game Characters: No modeling or rigging required
items.headline: Create and animate professional-level, 3D game characters without any experience in modeling, sculpting or rigging.
objectives_summary: Create custom 3D Characters
Morph custom 3D Characters
Create clothing for 3D Characters

items.title: Combat Knife 3D Game Asset in Blender and Substance Painter
items.headline: Learn to model, UV unwrap, and texture a high quality game asset from start to finish.
objectives_summary: Create Professional, Realistic, and Efficient Game Models
Learn UV Unwrapping in Blender Using Seams and Other Unwrapping Tools
Learn how to Bake Normal Maps in both Blender and Substance Painter

items.title: Blender Basics
items.headline: Easy to follow tutorials to learn basic animation in Blender.
objectives_summary: Create and model in 3D
Rig a simple character
Animate in Blender

items.title: 3D Printing Basics
items.headline: Want to learn about 3D Printers? Airscrew Academy is the perfect place to start!
objectives_summary: Explain the 3D Printing process
Identify different kinds of printers and materials
Know what you can make and where to begin!

items.title: FREE After Effects Basics -2D Flat Shadows in After Effects

visible_instructors.name: Andrew
visible_instructors.job_title: Engaged and Passionate PowerPoint & After Effects instructor
visible_instructors.title: Andrew Pach

items.headline: Intro to After Effects - Learn After Effects Animation with this basic free course
objectives_summary: Get started with After Effects the right way, learn essential tools & a proper workflow
I will touch on topics like precomposing, growing bounds, effects, simple expressions and more
Learn built-in effects in After Effects

items.title: TinkerCad for Beginners
items.headline: Get a quick tour of the User Interface and familiarize yourself with all the buttons and tools available in Tinkercad.
objectives_summary: Will be able to take basic shapes and combine them in to advanced scenes.

items.title: Animatron University - Beginner Course
items.headline: Animation for the rest of us!
objectives_summary: Create HTML5 animation
Use Animatron - a FREE web based software - to create fun, engaging and exciting animations

items.title: 3DS Max Learn Basics Foundation Course

visible_instructors.name: Anchit
visible_instructors.job_title: 3ds Max Certified Professional, Founder of CGDeltAcademy
visible_instructors.title: Anchit Kawaatra

items.headline: Start 3D, the right way within 2 hrs!
objectives_summary: Create small objects in 3D like Golf Ball, Bed, Wine Glass for starters.
Understand what Spline Modelling and Polygon Modelling is.
Have enough knowledge to start modelling of complex objects and also understand high level courses on Udemy itself.

items.title: Unreal Engine 4 for Architecture - Fundamentals Course

visible_instructors.name: Hardy
visible_instructors.job_title: Ordinary Guy with a passion for Archviz
visible_instructors.title: Hardy Hutajaya

items.headline: Use the Unreal Engine to create beautiful Arch Viz walkthroughs for Virtual Reality
objectives_summary: Students will be able to 'convert' their Archviz work in 3ds max and transfer them into Unreal Engine 4 to make it 'Playable'.
Students will be able to understand the general workflow of using the unreal engine 4 for their archviz work.
Understand how to use the unreal engine material editor

items.title: 3D CAD Fundamentals with SIEMENS Solid Edge
items.headline: STEM to STEAM - An Artistic Approach to 3D Modeling
objectives_summary: At the end of my course students will have a solid creative understanding of 3D part modeling.
